name: powerbargain
description:
Instructions :

the big blue bar is your score Negative attributes (don't make it too high) anger(orange) people will kill you if the anger bar fill too much profile(yellow) people wants to abduct you if you are too famous insanity(purple) you don't know who you are if you are insane

Positive attributes(don't make it too low

strength(red) your body too weak then you will die agility(green) your body too slow then you will die intelligence (blue) people easily used you if you are too dumb
